alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued October 04 at 4:20AM AKDT until October 07 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood and damage fish or hunting camps along the coast. Some critical infrastructure in communities may be inundated. Significant erosion is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to rise 3 to 6 feet above normal high tide line. The highest water levels are expected Thursday night through Friday morning.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
